wikipedia_page.main: Michaela Staniford (born 11 January 1987) is an English female rugby union player. She represented England at the 2010 Women's Rugby World Cup. She was also named in the squad to the 2014 Women's Rugby World Cup. She captained England to the 2013 Rugby World Cup Sevens.Staniford was awarded the IRB Women’s Player of the Year in 2012, Michaela is a lesbian and is married to Emilie Bydwell. She also has her own website.

response: * IRB Women’s Player of the Year: Michaela Staniford
| align="right" valign="top" | 15|| || Danielle Waterman (Eng, 3), Aurelie Bailon (Fra), Michaela Staniford (Eng, 3), Sarah Beale (Eng, 3).

England head coach Gary Street announced the squad for Women's Rugby World Cup on 4 May 2010. Bristol No. 8 Catherine Spencer was named captain, while Saracens hooker Amy Garnett is the most experienced player with 86 caps and three rugby world cups behind her. Margaret Alphonsi, Charlotte Barras, Rachael Burford, Tamara Taylor, Amy Turner and Danielle Waterman will also feature in their second successive world cup campaigns. Lichfield’s Emily Scarratt is team's youngest member with 16 tries in 18 games.Richmond centre Claire Allan was replaced by Wasps wing Michaela Staniford because of a knee injury.
Emilie is a lesbian and is married to Michaela Staniford.
